description: Rank Up to raise your Stamina and Cost Limit.
title: Rank Up

description:
The Leader Skill of the character you choose as your Friend will 
activate automatically when the quest begins !
title: Friends

description:
The Leader Skill of the character you choose as the Leader 
during Team Formation will activate automatically!
title: Leader Skills

description:
Cause heavy damage to your opponent by attacking
with the Type it is weak against.
If you attack with the Type it is strong against,
your opponent will guard against it.
title: Type

description:
Instead of choosing only powerful fighters,
rethink the balance of your Team Formation with
the different Types in mind!
title: Team Formation

description:
Your Link Skills will activate according to your attack order.
Use this power to your advantage!
title: Link Skills

description: It never hurts to have more Ki. Build up as much as you can.
title: Ki Spheres

description:
Once a certain amount of Ki is built up,
a Super Attack will be unleashed. Keep them coming!
title: Super Attacks

description:
Log in every day to receive Zeni and Dragon Stones. 
If you log in 7 days in a row, you will get a Chain Login Bonus.
title: Chain Login Bonus

description: Log in once a day and get a Total Login Bonus.
title: Total Login Bonus

description:
Once even a single type of Awakening Item
reaches the required amount,
you can activate an Awakening.
It will drastically raise your stats!
title: Awakening

description:
Get more EXP Points by training against identical characters
to the one you want to level up.
Your Super Attack level will also go up!
title: Training

description:
Fight a specific opponent by tapping on them.
Choose an opponent with a Type that gives you the best advantage.
title: Targets

description: Use your Friend Points to obtain Cards! Make friends and save up!
title: Friend Points

description:
Get more EXP Points by training against characters
that are the same Type.
title: Enhance Super Attack

description:
Set your most important characters as favorites
so that you don't accidentally sell them.
title: Favorites

description:
If you delete the app, your data will disappear!
Be sure to create a Device Transfer Code from the Menu.
title: Don't Delete!

description:
Are you guarded against your opponent's attacks?
Guard yourself by using the Type that is strongest
against your opponent's Type!
title: Guard

description:
Use your Super Attack with a full Dokkan meter
to activate Dokkan Mode.
Time your taps to deal massive damage!
title: Dokkan Mode

description: When in trouble go to Help! You can find it in the Menu.
title: Help

description:
Good things will happen when you gather all 7 Dragon Balls!
If you find one, be sure to pick it up!
title: Dragon Balls

description:
Quest with a Friend instead of a Guest,
and you will receive more Friend Points!
title: Friend Points

description:
When your opponents grow strong,
take advantage of Support Items!
Different Items will give different effects,
so be sure to try them out.
title: Support Items

description:
Ki Spheres of the same color will give you double the Ki.
Try aiming for them when you want to use your Super Attack!
title: Super Attacks

description:
On the Shenron Screen,
tap and hold your finger over a Dragon Ball
not yet in your collection to reveal its stage location!
title: Dragon Radar

description:
The first character in the enemy lineup
will aim for the member at the head of your party.
Don't forget to think about Types before you battle!
title: First Attack Guard

description:
Enemies will target the character from your party
who attacked directly before them. Remember,
Types play a crucial role in defense too!
title: Attack & Defense

description: Collect Ki Spheres that match your Type to recover a little HP.
title: HP Recovery

description:
When a boss brings along reinforcements,
focus your attacks on the non-boss characters first.
This will reduce the number of attacks you receive.
title: Boss Battles

description:
The amount of Ki required for a full-powered
attack varies from fighter to fighter.
Make sure to check the Character Details thoroughly.
title: Ki Amount

description:
This page contains helpful game hints.
View it by tapping the banner on the Home page.
title: Master Roshi's Teachings

description: Pinch in or out on the map screen to control the zoom.
title: Map Zoom

description:
Picking up gold capsules scattered around the map
to get rare items and Medals.
There are white, bronze, silver, and gold capsules,
with gold offering the best rewards.
title: Hoi-Poi Capsules Colors

description:
Capsule labels indicate their contents.
Red is for Training Items, blue is for Support Items,
and purple is for Awakening Medals.
title: Hoi-Poi Capsules Labels

description:
Downloading all data can reduce individual load times.
Tap "Download All" from the title screen and give it a try!
title: Download All

description:
Awakening a character adds a "Super" or "Extreme" prefix
to their Type and makes them stronger!
title: Awakened Types

description:
Tap and hold a Ki Sphere on the first row to preview the route.
Checking the route before making your move
is a powerful battle strategy!
title: Check Ki Spheres

description:
Baba's Shop is home to a diverse stock of goods.
Drop by often to pick up useful items.
title: Baba's Shop

description:
Characters with rarity of UR or higher can have their
"Hidden Potential" activated to become even stronger!
Stay on top of things by tapping into 
your characters' full potential!
title: Hidden Potential Activation

description:
Facebook linking is another way to recover your game data.
Give it a thought — just in case
something happens to your device!
title: Facebook Linking

description:
Activating Hidden Potential will make the stars on
your thumbnail icon sparkle. 
A rainbow-colored radiance is a sign that
hidden potential has been fully unlocked!
title: Thumbnail Icon

description:
Tapping the top/bottom section of the character list screen
will instantly jump to the first/last row.
title: Character List

description:
Status Effects appear as icons over the affected character.
Visit the Help section to view the list of Status Effects.
title: Status Icon

description:
Baba's Shop features sales every once in a while.
Drop by to grab nifty items for a bargain!
title: Baba's Shop

description:
Training Items boost Training efficiency.
Some events make them especially easy to come by.
Train smarter and forge your team into
an invincible fighting force!
title: Training

description:
After losing a battle, you can use Dragon Stones to
pick up where you left off.
If you're having trouble winning on the first attempt,
try using a Continue!
title: Continues

description:
Make Super Attacks even fiercer by boosting their level!
Some characters will even feature special effects upon
reaching a certain Super Attack Level.
Power up Super Attacks to make your team
the strongest they can be!
title: Super Attack Level

description:
Dokkan Awakening is a special type of Awakening that
elevates your characters to even greater heights of strength!
After acquiring an Awakenable character,
go for a Dokkan Awakening to really up the ante!
title: Dokkan Awaken

description:
There's a range of different Hercule Statues—and they all
fetch a good price! Trade them in for Zeni and
you'll be rolling in it in no time!
title: Hercule Statue
